intro1: You have one goal, sell coffee...
intro2: Your galactic coffee dreams start now.
makeCoffee1_tooltip: Grind raw coffee beans to get grounded beans to make sellable coffee.
makeCoffee2_tooltip: Grinding requires multiple clicks and making coffee takes time.
makeCoffee3_tooltip: Making coffee requires grounded beans and empty cups.
sellCoffee_tooltip: Sell available coffee to waiting customers
promote_tooltip: Promote your coffee stand to attract customers
shop_tooltip: Buy raw coffee beans from the market
restock_tooltip: Restock beans and empty cups weekly, or on demand for a fee.
deluxe_coffee_pot_upgDesc: Make more sellable coffee at once, at the cost of longer time to make
makeshift_coffee_refiller_upgDesc: Automatically starts a second coffee batch after the first is done, as long as there's enough beans
automatic_coffee_refiller_upgDesc: Upgrade the amount of coffee batches you can make by a single click!
enlist_younger_sibling_upgDesc: Pay your younger sibling 50 WHOLE DOLLARS to help grind beans for you
sibling_incentive_upgDesc: Offer incentive to speed up your sibling's grinding rate
bulk_bean_deal_upgDesc: Arrange for a better bulk bean buying deal. Purchase more beans at once for a bulk discount
stand_sign_upgDesc: Invest in a sigh for your coffee stand. Passively draw customer interest, and increase maximum appeal!
promotional_posters_upgDesc: Attract more customers per promotion with promotional posters
word_of_mouth_upgDesc: Allow your customers to spread the word about your coffee stand
hire_neighborhood_kid_upgDesc: Hire a slightly more competent neighborhood kid to help sell coffee
neighborhood_kid_incentive_upgDesc: Encourage the neighborhood kid to take selling coffee more seriously with money
preshop_nicer_coffee_upgDesc: Put more love into your coffee and charge more for it!
express_coffee_maker_upgDesc: Speed up the production time of coffee
additional_coffee_drips_upgDesc: Make more cups of sellable coffee per session, without increasing production time
buy_coffee_shop_upgDesc: Rent land to start a proper coffee shop! Open new managerial options and coffee creation options!
unlock_multishop_upgDesc: One shop was easy enough, now get ready for more!
unlock_promoter_upgDesc: Open a new promoter position dedicated to drawing customers in
flashy_sign_upgDesc: Passively attract more customers to your storefront!
expand_cashier_counter_upgDesc: Expand your cashier counter to increase server capacity
expand_coffee_bar_upgDesc: Expand the space coffee is made and increase barista capacity
upgrade_cash_register_upgDesc: Increase overall speed of customer checkouts
increase_customer_flow_upgDesc: Increase multiplicitive speed of each customer checkout
better_coffee_machine_upgDesc: Increase the speed of coffee production multiplicatively
upgrade_barista_tools_upgDesc: Gain a straight boost to barista speed
promoter_effectiveness_upgDesc: Increase the effectiveness of your promoters
